title: EventBridge Scheduler to Run ECS Task
description: Simple pattern that run task in Amazon Elastic Container Service cluster every 15 minutes.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample pattern demonstrates how to use EventBridge Scheduler to run task in Amazon Elastic Container Service cluster every 15 minutes and deployed using the AWS CDK for Java.
